projects: [{"title":"Experimental Analysis of Poverty Cycle","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"• Developed a closed room experimental framework to test decision-making (varying dimensions of subject decision) in limited/unlimited cash scenarios• Conducted experiments under various paradigms, to understand what policy framework supports the decision-making"},{"title":"Modelling Small World Properties of a Neuronal Network","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"• Developed a basic 3D model of a network of cortical neurons on MATLAB based on fundamental statistical distributions for learning process simulation• Analyzing the frequencies of various structural motifs and introducing additional connectivity rules"},{"title":"VIX Entropy & Portfolio Rotation Timing","start_date":"Nov 2016","end_date":"Jan 2017","description":"Presented the work at India Finance Conference, IIM Ahmedabad, 2017"},{"title":"Price Volume Dynamics in Equity Markets","start_date":"Mar 2016","end_date":"Jan 2017","description":"Presented the work at Asia-Pacific Economic Science Association Conference, 2017Sponsored by: National Stock Exchange of India Ltd• Analysed the dynamics of stock price returns and trading volume in a time series-cross sectional model of Nifty 50 market • Employed trading volume as investor sentiment proxy to derive a pricing kernel or risk factor to capture the underlying investor sentiment • Analysed the past 7 years' Nifty 50 to understand if such a behavioural/stochastic pricing kernel/risk factor empirically explains (expected) stock returns"},{},{"title":"End to End Quality of Service Implementation in 3G/4G Transmission Networks","start_date":"May 2016","end_date":"Jul 2016","description":"• Planning and process synchronization between stakeholders for Quality of Service (QoS) Implementation on 3G (Layer 2) and 4G (Layer 2/3)• Analysis of the KPI Trends to establish the projected and effect of QoS• Implementation done in over 2500 3G/4G sites for over 3500 plans• Development of Optimization strategies for QoS update plannings"},{"title":"Rural Development Live Project","start_date":"Mar 2016","end_date":"Apr 2016","description":"• Addressed 'Infrastructure & Sanitation'; was awarded best live project by Rural Development Centre, IIT Kharagpur among the 15 participating groups • Designed resource-optimization strategies for implementation, solving the subject issue along with related problems of Employment and Logistics"},{},{},{},{"title":"Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2016","start_date":"Oct 2015","end_date":"Feb 2016","description":"• Global Entrepreneurship Summit [GES] is nation's largest entrepreneurial gathering by a student-run body• Sponsors: OnePlus, IBM, Porche, Mahindra Rise, Brand Capital, BSE, NSDL, IDBI Bank• Media Partners: Bloomberg TV, The Telegraph, Yourstory, Business India, India Today Aspire• Events: Empresario [B-Model Competition] Finale, Kharagpur Angel Network Pitch, Product Expo"},{},{},{"title":"Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive 2015","start_date":"Apr 2015","end_date":"Oct 2015","description":"• Pan-India Entrepreneurship Awareness/Support camp conducted across 24 major cities of India• Partners include: IBM, OnePlus, Augray, Economic Times & NASSCOM• Events include guest lecture series from inspiring Indian Entrepreneur and relevant workshops series by IBM"},{},{},{"title":"Power System Analysis Software","start_date":"May 2015","end_date":"Jun 2015","description":"Development of Power System Analysis software set to augment the rigorous calculations for Earthing installation purpose • Earthing System Design: Developed an integrated software for Earthing system installation data calculation based on IEEE norms and standards • Fault Level Calculations: Developed the software to calculate fault level currents during transmission faults at different ends of power transmission • Voltage Drop / Cable Selection: Automated the process of cable selection for power transmission by implementing an IEEE based Graphic User Interface • Currently the set of software is in practical industrial use in Larsen &Toubro Electrical Business Group, New Delhi"}]
